original_text: You know it was because of a bodily ailment that I preached the gospel to you at first,
korean_text: 내가 처음에 육체의 약함으로 말미암아 너희에게 복음을 전한 것을 너희가 아는 바라

sentences.original_text: it was because of a bodily ailment
that I preached the gospel to you at first
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 처음에 너희에게 복음을 전파한 것은
